sentences.english: The basic characteristics of the soil seed bank in flood plain grassland of the Fen River in Taiyuan region were investigated and studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了汾河太原段河漫灘草地土壤種子庫的基本特徵。

sentences.english: The armies campaigned in the northern Loess Plateau, modern Ningxia and the Huanghe floodplain.
sentences.chinese: 競選的軍隊在北部黃土高原，現代寧夏黃河漫灘。

sentences.english: Across an expanse of the Potomac floodplain, airplanes were landing at National Airport.
sentences.chinese: 跨過寬闊的波托馬克河漫灘，飛機在國家機場降落。
